pages.text: $(li)The Illager Archer Towers are surveillance zones of the Illagers.$(br)$(li)Be careful, those towers are full of Archers.$(br)$(li)You should visit them, on top of the tower they usually keep a chest with provisions.
$(li)The Illager Archer Tower can be found in the Desert, Extreme Hills, Forest, Icy, Jungle, Mesa, Mushroom Forest, Plains, Savanna, Swamp and Taiga biomes.
